item.title: Replace super using After Effects for 2 x 10s videos in Chinese 0383WES - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking to produce the following assets:

We have 2x 10sec videos (in 9x16 and 16x9) with the aep and project files to replace the English language text with Simplified Chinese.

We will supply the translated text in Simplified Chinese.

After Effects working files are included for the animations, based on the original English.
We have the working files for the 9x16. The working files for the 16x9 will come later.
Also attached the two original English videos in 9x16 and 16x9 for your reference.

Output will ultimately be 2 x mp4 files maximum 10MB each.

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 21, 2024 07:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audiovisual Translation, Video Post-Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Caption
Skills: Audiovisual Translation, Video Post-Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Caption
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: [URGENT] Video Edit and Sound Design | SFX for simple video piece - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

We're trying to look for an editor who can help us stitch some video clips that we've generated and lay in some awesome sounds to it to really make it come to life in the next couple of days - we would need the final material by Sunday night (Asia - Singapore time) so if you're keen and available today and over the weekend.

We will take care of producing the clips (AI-generated ;) it's gonna be super edgy and cool!) and the storyboard. All you have to do is stitch them up and add SFX/music/cool audio to it that you feel is apt and make it a super awesome material.

Happy to jumpstart a contract right away for those ready ASAP! :)

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 07:01 UTC
Category: Audio Production
Skills:Audio Editing, Audio Production, Video Ad, Audio Effects, Sound Mixing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Audio Production, Video Ad, Audio Effects, Sound Mixing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing
Country: Singapore

item.title: Social media video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Social media video editor needed for an award-winning Black News Podcast. The Editor should be able to cut 10-20 minute zoom video recordings down to 90 second videos with logo, music, and news story images for Instagram, LinkedIn, and possibly Tiktok. Should be able to work quickly and professionally making sure videos are properly sized for platforms.

item.title: Video editor and graphic designer required for social media content - Upwork
item.description:
#### Responsibilities

#### Podcast Production:

- Edit weekly video and audio recordings of our podcast using **Davinci Resolve**.
- Ensure smooth transitions by silencing one speaker while the other is talking.
- Cut across multiple camera angles, edit where appropriate.
- Add subtitles and create multiple thumbnails for the long-form video.
- Publish the final video on YouTube.
- Extract and edit the final audio, and publish it on all major podcast platforms.

#### Short Form Content Creation:

- Create approximately 16 short-form videos from each weekly podcast.
- Add graphic elements and subtitles to these videos using Adobe Photoshop.
- Publish reels on Instagram, shorts on YouTube, and TikTok.

#### Engagement and Improvement:

- Be proactive in suggesting ideas to improve engagement.
- Deliver high-quality content on time.
- Maintain excellent communication throughout the project.

#### Deliverables

- Final edited videos and audio files.
- Source files for all edited content.
- All original files will be uploaded to a Google Drive folder for download each week.
- All final files to be uploaded to the same Google Drive within 3 days of upload.

#### Requirements

- Proven experience in video and audio editing using DaVinci Resolve.
- Proficiency with Adobe Photoshop for graphic editing.
- Experience in adding subtitles and graphic elements to videos.
- Familiarity with social media platforms (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok) and their publishing tools.
- Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
- Strong communication skills.
- Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail.

#### Preferred Qualifications

- Experience in creating and editing podcast content.
- Background in digital marketing or social media management.
- Knowledge of current trends in social media and content creation.

#### How to Apply

We will be selecting the successful candidate based on how closely their previous work matches our requirements, their ability to communicate clearly and a clear demonstration of their ability to think beyond the scope of the brief to deliver excellent work.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 06:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Audition, Instagram Reels, Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Podcast Editing, Social Media Management
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Audition, Instagram Reels, Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Podcast Editing, Social Media Management
Country: Bahrain
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing and Sound - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor who can enhance the visual appeal and audio quality of our video. The candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing techniques and be proficient in audio editing software. The main tasks will include cutting and trimming footage, adding transitions and effects, adjusting color and lighting, and synchronizing audio with video. The ideal candidate should be able to bring creativity and innovation to the project while adhering to our brand guidelines.
    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Audio editing
    - Creative thinking
    - Attention to detail
    - Proficiency in video editing software
    - Knowledge of audio editing techniques

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 21, 2024 06:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Audio Production, Video Post-Editing, Audio Post Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Audio Production, Video Post-Editing, Audio Post Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: VSL Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented and creative Video Editor with a passion for crafting compelling User Generated Content (UGC) Ads? Are you experienced in creating engaging content  to drive product sales? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you to join our team as a Video Editor specializing in Direct Response Ads.


Responsibilities:

- Creating engaging video content for direct response marketing ads.
- Collaborating with the marketing team to conceptualize and execute video campaigns.
- Staying up to date with the latest video trends and techniques.
- Managing multiple projects at once and meeting deadlines.
- Editing and delivering final video assets in various formats suitable for social media platforms.


Posted On: June 21, 2024 06:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Data Entry, Education Presentation
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Data Entry, Education Presentation

item.title: SaaS Explainer Video Creator for Tech Product - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video creator to produce a concise and engaging explainer video for our SaaS tech product. The video should be 1-2 minutes long, combining live-action presentations and some animation.

The video should highlight the problem we are trying to solve, features and benefits in a clear and engaging manner. The goal is to create a video that informs and captivates our target audience, effectively communicating our product's value.

Thanks!

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 21, 2024 06:50 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, 2D Animation, Graphic Design, Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, 2D Animation, Graphic Design, Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, Adobe Illustrator

item.title: German Language YouTube Business Documentary Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor with experience in creating business documentary videos for our YouTube channel. The videos will be similar to those produced by Magnates Media. The content will be in German language, so fluency in German is required. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to create engaging and informative videos that captivate our audience.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Fluent in German
- Strong storytelling ability
- Attention to detail
- Proficient in video editing software

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate level video editor who can bring creativity and professionalism to our videos.

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 21, 2024 06:27 UTC
Category: Language Tutoring
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Country: Germany
